title: Emma, Carrie, Vivian
description: The eugenicists were utopians, convinced that they were doing hard but necessary things. And that included making decisions about who could have children.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
content:encoded: The eugenicists were utopians, convinced that they were doing hard but necessary things. And that included making decisions about who could have children.
